Murders and Attempted Murders
lead_paragraph: Michael Haynes was days away from reporting to the New Rochelle, N.Y., campus when he was fatally shot near his home in Chicago.
snippet: Michael Haynes was days away from reporting to the New Rochelle, N.Y., campus when he was fatally shot near his home in Chicago.
